page.title: 05Blackberry Time near Winford
page.content: In Autumn during the months of September and October I go blackberry picking up Old Hill. My mum comes with me and we usually cycle there. We look at the hedges when we go past. The blackberries are black. When they first come out they are red, then they change to black. We take a bag with us to put them in. Around the blackberries are lots of thorns and brambles, we usually get pricked. My mum makes pies out of the fruit. I like the mousse she does best, it is very scrumptious. We find this our favourite spot to go picking, but there are many other hedgerows in the area where people go.
